resources.string: Cannot take photo. Please insert a storage card or change the storage path of photos.
Not Enough Storage. Photo/video may not be saved.
In order to write to the SD card, App needs you to explicitly grant permission through Android. After you press CONFIRM, the Android document selection dialog will be displayed.
Please navigate to your external SD card and select the top level folder.
You may need to use a menu option to show the SD card.
